content.raw:
Link to handsim branch with Gazebo-side implementation: [implement_sim_api](#!/osrf/handsim/branch/implement_sim_api#diff)

[`HaptixWorldPlugin`](#!/osrf/handsim/branch/implement_sim_api#chg-src/HaptixWorldPlugin.cc) creates a bunch of ignition transport subscribers that manipulate Gazebo models, links, joints, etc. in their callbacks

[`sim_api`](#!/osrf/handsim/branch/implement_sim_api#chg-test/integration/sim_api.cc) integration test shows several examples of the sim API calls.
content.html:
Link to handsim branch with Gazebo-side implementation: implement_sim_api

HaptixWorldPlugin creates a bunch of ignition transport subscribers that manipulate Gazebo models, links, joints, etc. in their callbacks

sim_api integration test shows several examples of the sim API calls.
